effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavorTexts.text:
The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.
